translation.en: In nomine Patris et Filii et Spiritus Sancti. Amen.
translation.ja: 〈父と子と聖霊の御名によって アーメン〉

translation.en: Hannah.
Hannah.
Hannah.
God himself commands you,
translation.ja: 神が自ら お前に命じる

translation.en: depart from the body of Hannah Grace, you demon,
translation.ja: ハンナ･グレイスの 体から出ていけ

translation.en: along with every satanic power of the enemy,
along with every specter from hell.
Stop!
Hannah, I know you're in there.
translation.ja: ハンナ　いるんだろ

translation.en: You have to fight, baby.
Fight it, Hannah.
Fight it. Fight it, Hannah.
translation.ja: 打ち勝つんだ ハンナ

translation.en: [SOBBING] You have to fight.
Baby, it's me.
translation.ja: ハンナ　父さんだよ

translation.en: Dad. Daddy's here, baby.
translation.ja: 父さん ここにいるよ

translation.en: Dad. Honey. Baby.
Dad.
[STUTTERING] You have to fight.
In the name of the Father, in the name of the Son, in the name of the Holy Spirit.
translation.ja: 父と子と聖霊の御名によって

translation.en: Hannah, stop!
No.
DEMON: Your whore daughter is mine.
She's mine forever.
Forgive me.
LISA [ON VOICE MAIL]: Meg. Hey, it's Lisa. I just talked to Dr. Lewis
translation.ja: メーガン　リサよ ドクターが 面接してくれるって

translation.en: and you're good to go, so maybe you can
translation.ja: ドクターが 面接してくれるって 今日の午後 来て じゃあね

translation.en: come in this afternoon. Okay, bye.
translation.ja: 今日の午後 来て じゃあね

translation.en: Hey.
You look nervous. Are you okay?
It's a job interview. I think I'm supposed to be nervous.
translation.ja: 就職面接よ　緊張するわ

translation.en: Okay. Come on, let's go get a coffee.
LISA: This will be good.
translation.ja: コーヒーでも飲もう 夜勤明けに 一緒に依存症(ＡＡ)の集会へ行けるし

translation.en: We'll go to meetings in the morning after our shifts end
translation.ja: 夜勤明けに 一緒に依存症(ＡＡ)の集会へ行けるし

translation.en: and I'll be three floors up, so if you need anything...
translation.ja: 私も同じ病院内にいる

translation.en: You know?
Thank you for this.
Don't thank me yet. You still have to meet Dr. Lewis.
translation.ja: お礼は早いわ 面接はこれからよ

translation.en: DR. LEWIS: This job is not for everyone.
We've had three overnight intake assistants in the last six months alone.
translation.ja: 半年で３人の夜勤番が辞めた

translation.en: Because of the hours?
No, because it's a thankless, solitary position.
translation.ja: ひと晩中 孤独だし―

translation.en: The smell. You never get used to the smell.
I was a cop. I'm totally used to bad smells.
translation.ja: 警官だったので 悪臭は平気です

translation.en: Lisa mentioned that there were issues.
translation.ja: 健康面で問題があったとか

translation.en: Yes. There were issues. But I'm much better now.
translation.ja: ええ　もう良くなりました

translation.en: Well, she assured me that you could handle the job. Is it something you think you can handle?
translation.ja: 君は適任だとリサは言ってるが どうかな？

translation.en: I can handle it.
COMPUTER: Going down.
It gets to you after a while, being here. People get creeped out.
translation.ja: しばらく経つと 皆 神経が参ってしまう

translation.en: Before you know it, their imaginations are running wild, they're hearing things go bump in the night.
translation.ja: 想像力が暴走して 不気味な音が聞こえ始める

translation.en: Not me.
I believe when you die, you die. End of story.
translation.ja: 死人は死人 動いたりしません

translation.en: Good.
COMPUTER: Arrived at morgue.
At night, you can't get in or out without swiping this card.
translation.ja: 夜間はカードがないと 出入りできない

translation.en: If you lose it, hospital security has to let you in. They will not be happy.
translation.ja: なくしたら警備員に 入れてもらうしかない

translation.en: Most of the lights are on a sensor. The rest you have to switch on manually.
translation.ja: 大半の照明がセンサー式だ 手動のものもある

translation.en: There are a lot of files that need to be entered into the system. I hope you don't mind data entry.
translation.ja: データ入力作業も かなりあるが平気かね？

translation.en: No, not at all.
Men's room is down there, women's room is down there,
translation.ja: 男子トイレに女子トイレ

translation.en: and down there to the left is the incinerator room for cremation.
translation.ja: 廊下を行った左が 火葬用の焼却室

translation.en: COMPUTER: Intake bay.
DR. LEWIS: This intake bay is for drop-offs only. No drop-off, no access.
translation.ja: ここは遺体を 引き取る時にだけ使う

translation.en: And you never leave the premises while you're on duty. No exceptions.
translation.ja: 勤務中は 建物の外に出ないこと

translation.en: [CHIMES] COMPUTER: Arrived at morgue.
Well, you bring the cadaver up from the intake bay, and take it into the receiving room, which is over here.
translation.ja: 受け取った遺体は そこにある記録室へ運ぶ

translation.en: First you take an overview of the body and then close-ups of each individual injury.
translation.ja: 全身を撮った後 個々の傷をアップで撮る

translation.en: COMPUTER: Image captured. All right, you try.
Rigor mortis makes a corpse difficult to fingerprint.
translation.ja: 遺体の指関節を押さえれば―

translation.en: Now, if you press on the knuckle, it will extend the finger, and make it easier to handle.
translation.ja: 指が伸びるので 指紋採取が楽になる

translation.en: Gently roll.
translation.ja: ゆっくり ていねいに

translation.en: COMPUTER: Scanning.
This doohickey sends the prints to a crime database.
Green means they're ready to go. Red means they're not.
translation.ja: 緑ならいいが 赤なら問題あり

translation.en: Yeah.
Green...
Green means go.
Thanks, Moe. You bet, Doc.
The shift starts tomorrow night at 11, goes to 7 in the morning.
translation.ja: 明日から頼む 夜11時から朝７時だ

translation.en: Any problems with that? Not at all.
translation.ja: 問題は？ ありません 機会を下さって感謝します

translation.en: Well, thank you for the opportunity.
translation.ja: ありません 機会を下さって感謝します

translation.en: I promise you won't be disappointed.
Welcome to the team.
Thanks.
Hey, do you need to see my I.D.?
Do you work here?
In the morgue. I'm Megan.
Then no.
Hey, I'm Dave.
Megan. Nice to meet you.
And, you know, welcome to the graveyard shift.
translation.ja: 夜勤シフトへようこそ

translation.en: Thanks.
COMPUTER: Morgue.
COMPUTER: Intake bay.
COMPUTER: Arrived at intake bay.
Who are you? Where's Larry?
I don't know who Larry is, but I'm Megan.
translation.ja: さあ　私はメーガン

translation.en: COMPUTER: Morgue.
You've got to be the right kind to stomach a job like this.
translation.ja: この職を選ぶとは奇特な人ね

translation.en: Personally... I'm not what you'd call a people person.
translation.ja: 私の場合は 人付き合いが苦手だからよ

translation.en: Dead's the way I like them.
COMPUTER: Image captured.
COMPUTER: Scanning.
Green means go.
Hey. [GASPS]
Goddamn it, Dave. Sorry.
translation.ja: 何よ　驚いた ごめん

translation.en: Not funny.
I didn't mean to. I honestly just came down to check on you.
translation.ja: 脅かす気なんて なかったんだ

translation.en: Shit. I feel like an asshole. Forgive me?
translation.ja: 僕 最低だな 許してくれる？

translation.en: I'll never do it again.
Really not funny.
Hey.
MAN 1: Why didn't you shoot me? MAN 2: Megan, do something.
MEGAN: I don't know what triggers it, really.
A lot of things, I guess.
But I still have nightmares of what happened.
Put your hands up!
Me just...
standing there...
doing nothing.
I just freeze up and I can't move.
translation.ja: 身動きすらできなかった

translation.en: It's okay. I've got you. I've got you.
translation.ja: メーガン　もう大丈夫

translation.en: I want it so bad sometimes.
translation.ja: 時々 無性に欲しくなる

translation.en: The drink and the pills, I want them so bad.
translation.ja: お酒と薬が すごく恋しくなるの

translation.en: Thank you, Megan, for sharing.
translation.ja: 話してくれてありがとう

translation.en: MAN: Hey.
I just, um, need the rest of my stuff.
translation.ja: 残りの荷物を取りに来た

translation.en: My shift just ended, but if this is a bad time...
translation.ja: 都合が悪ければ改めて…

translation.en: No. No, come in.
And you're still in your pajamas because...?
Oh, I, uh...
translation.ja: 昨夜から 新しい仕事を始めたの

translation.en: I started a new job last night. A night job.
translation.ja: 昨夜から 新しい仕事を始めたの 夜勤なのよ

translation.en: That's great.
Doing what?
Overnight intake assistant at the morgue.
translation.ja: 霊安室の遺体引き取り係

translation.en: It's better than it sounds.
Yeah, I'm basically running the place at night, all on my own.
translation.ja: 夜勤は一人だから気楽よ

translation.en: Are you sure that's a good idea, you know... spending so much time alone right now?
translation.ja: 長時間 一人だなんて 平気かい？

translation.en: Actually, I do. You know, it keeps me from going out at night
translation.ja: ええ　夜遊びに 出なくなるから―

translation.en: doing things I might regret in the morning. It worked for Lisa and she thinks it could work for me, too.
translation.ja: お酒に近づかないし リサも“効果があった”と

translation.en: "Lisa"? My AA sponsor.
The nurse at the hospital.
She says it keeps her out of trouble working the night shift.
translation.ja: 夜勤は誘惑を断てるって

translation.en: So, when a job opened up at the morgue, she thought of me.
translation.ja: 仕事を紹介してくれた

translation.en: Yeah, still, too much time alone is never good for anyone.
translation.ja: 一人の時間が長いのは心配だ

translation.en: Says the guy who moved out.
You didn't give me much of a choice.
That's not true, Andrew. You know that's not true.
translation.ja: ウソよ アンドリュー

translation.en: Since when are you concerned about the truth?
translation.ja: 君が俺を ウソつき呼ばわり？

translation.en: I didn't come to...
I should go.
COMPUTER: Intake bay.
COMPUTER: Arrived at intake bay.
I forgot my key. Could you open the door?
translation.ja: 鍵を忘れた 開けてくれないか？

translation.en: You don't work here.
Yes, I do. Just let me in.
translation.ja: 違う 早く入れてくれ

translation.en: Sir, back away from the door. No. No. No.
translation.ja: ドアから離れて 頼む

translation.en: Sir. Let me in!
I'm going to call security. Back away from the door.
translation.ja: 警備員を呼ぶ そこから離れて

translation.en: COMPUTER: Morgue. MAN: Let me in!
Let me in!
MAN [ON PHONE]: Security.
Hey, I had a homeless guy at the intake bay.
translation.ja: 遺体搬入口にホームレスが

translation.en: MAN: Thanks for the heads-up. Yeah, we get that a lot.
Yeah.
COMPUTER: Arrived at intake bay.
Drop-off? Hey, yeah.
translation.ja: 搬入？ ああ そうだ

translation.en: Ooh. You're new here.
Megan. Randy.
translation.ja: メーガンよ ランディだ 手を貸してくれ　１人なんだ

translation.en: Could you give me a hand? I'm all alone tonight.
translation.ja: ランディだ 手を貸してくれ　１人なんだ

translation.en: Sorry. I can't leave the premises.
Yes. Yeah. Stickler on the rules.
translation.ja: そうかい 規則は破れないってか

translation.en: But I'll tell you right now,
if you don't help me get this thing inside,
it's going to start to rot and decay. It's just going to blow up like a puffer fish.
translation.ja: こいつは腐って フグみたいに膨らむ

translation.en: And then we're both going to lose our jobs.
Unless...
What do you think? All right, okay. Fine.
translation.ja: どうする？ 分かった

translation.en: Yeah? Yeah.
You're the best. My partner called in sick. Strep throat.
translation.ja: ありがたい 今日は相棒が病欠でね

translation.en: Which is 100 percent grade-A bullshit because--
translation.ja: どうせ仮病だ　今頃…

translation.en: Do you want to grab that side? Yeah.
He is holing up with his psycho ex-girlfriend.
translation.ja: イカれた元カノと しけ込んでる

translation.en: It seems like he should be making some new friends.
Yeah, I think he should probably pick a better psycho ex-girlfriend next time.
translation.ja: もっとマシな元カノを 選んでほしい

translation.en: So, I want to say thank you, by the way,
because the guy who used to have this job would never have just done that.
translation.ja: 前にここにいた奴とは 大違いだ

translation.en: He was a prick. Horrendous breath.
translation.ja: 息の臭い嫌な男だった

translation.en: How long have you been here? I just started.
translation.ja: 何日め？ まだ数日よ

translation.en: COMPUTER: Arrived at morgue.
MEGAN: What happened? RANDY: Oh, yeah, it's a bad one.
translation.ja: この遺体は？ 警官が路地で見つけた

translation.en: The cops found her in an alley. One, two, three.
translation.ja: 警官が路地で見つけた １ ２の３

translation.en: Yeah, so the guy was still slicing her. He took off. They still haven't found him.
translation.ja: 発見時 男が切り刻んでたが 逃げたそうだ

translation.en: Did they find out who he was? No clue.
translation.ja: その男は何者？ さあね

translation.en: "Hannah Grace."
Yeah, that's what it said on her I.D.
I told you it was bad.
That's not even the insane thing. The insane thing is they found chloroform by her body.
translation.ja: 死体のそばに クロロホルムの瓶があった

translation.en: What kind of a lunatic drugs a girl, smashes her head in,
translation.ja: 誰かが彼女を薬で眠らせ― 頭を殴って殺した後 焼こうとした

translation.en: and then tries to burn her body after she's been dead?
translation.ja: 頭を殴って殺した後 焼こうとした

translation.en: It's someone trying to send a message. It could have been her pimp.
translation.ja: 娼婦のヒモによる 見せしめかも

translation.en: Thanks, Randy. I can take it from here. You got it. Yeah.
translation.ja: ありがとう　あとは私が

translation.en: All right.
Thanks for the help, Megan.
It gets easier. I promise.
translation.ja: すぐ慣れるよ　大丈夫

translation.en: Thanks.
It's all part of the job.
COMPUTER: Error. Unable to load image.
translation.ja: エラー　撮影できません

translation.en: COMPUTER: Error.
Unable to load image.
What?
COMPUTER: Error. Unable to load image.
translation.ja: エラー　読み取れません

translation.en: "Username."
Megan Reed.
translation.ja: メーガン･リード メーガン･リード 〝ボストン市警察 〞

translation.en: "Password."
translation.ja: 〝ボストン市警察 〞 〝ボストン市警察 〞 パスワード

translation.en: Bye-bye, Megan.
Andrew Kurtz.
"Password."
Megan.
Brown.
Get out of here.
You're losing your mind.
It's freaking hot.
Dave?
Dave, you promised.
Dave!
Oh, my God.
If you scream, I will have to slit your throat.
translation.ja: 叫んだらノドをかき切るぞ

translation.en: Do you understand?
Yes.
Do you understand?
Come on. MAN [ON PHONE]: Security.
There's someone down here. Call the police now.
but deliver us from evil."
Stop. Put the body down.
translation.ja: 動くな 遺体を下ろして

translation.en: I've already called security. There's nowhere for you to go.
translation.ja: 警備員が来る　観念して

translation.en: Now, just stay calm. You don't understand.
translation.ja: じっとして 分かってない

translation.en: DAVE: Megan!
Megan!
Megan!
Get off of me! Get off of me!
Please, listen to me!
You've got to destroy her body. GUARD: Get him up!
You're coming with us. Please, listen to me.
MAN: Listen. Listen. GUARD: Are you okay?
You have to destroy her body. You've got to destroy her body.
You don't know what you've done!
You don't know what you-- She's not dead!
translation.ja: 彼女はまだ死んでないんだ

translation.en: Hello?
ANDREW [ON PHONE]: Megan, it's Andrew. I just heard what happened. Are you okay?
translation.ja: アンドリューだ 事情は聞いた　大丈夫か？

translation.en: Yeah, I'm fine, but I'm going to have to call you back.
translation.ja: ええ　後でかけ直す

translation.en: Hey, can you open the door?
Hey. Are you okay?
translation.ja: リサ 大丈夫？ ケガはない？

translation.en: Did that guy hurt you? No. No, not really.
translation.ja: 大丈夫？ ケガはない？ 問題ないわ　私は大丈夫

translation.en: [SIGHS] I'm fine. Do you want to call it a night?
translation.ja: 問題ないわ　私は大丈夫 もう上がる？ 誰かに代わらせるわ

translation.en: I can find someone else to cover your shift.
translation.ja: もう上がる？ 誰かに代わらせるわ

translation.en: I'm okay. Seriously, Lisa, I'm fine.
Nobody is going to hold it against you
translation.ja: 遠慮しないでいいのよ

translation.en: if you just want to get out of here.
translation.ja: 遠慮しないでいいのよ 分かってる でも途中で上がる気はない

translation.en: I know. But I want to stay. Okay? I can do this. I want to do this.
translation.ja: 分かってる でも途中で上がる気はない

translation.en: But you don't have to. Lisa.
I need to do this.
Okay.
What is it?
I know this is going to sound insane, but...
translation.ja: あり得ないことだけど…

translation.en: I heard a corpse breathe.
Breathe? Yes.
translation.ja: 呼吸？ そう　遺体が…

translation.en: Like...
an exhale.
Corpses expunge air sometimes when they're moved.
translation.ja: 動かすと 気体が漏れることがある

translation.en: Dr. Lewis didn't tell you this?
translation.ja: ドクターから聞いてない？

translation.en: In his defense, he...
translation.ja: 遺体は呼吸しないから―

translation.en: probably assumed I was smart enough to know that corpses can't breathe.
translation.ja: 言うまでもないと ドクターは思ったのね

translation.en: Are you hungry?
I can get us some take-out from the cafeteria.
Sure. Okay, come on.
You know, when that guy attacked me tonight...
translation.ja: 侵入者が襲ってきた時―

translation.en: my first instinct wasn't to run.
translation.ja: 本能的に逃げなかった

translation.en: You know, I wanted to defend myself,
to stop him.
I didn't freeze.
Why couldn't I have done that when there was a gun pointed at my partner?
translation.ja: 相棒が撃たれた時 同じようにできていれば―

translation.en: And then none of this would have happened.
Look, it's just one step at a time.
translation.ja: 焦らず一歩ずつ進みましょ

translation.en: This job is the next step.
Hey. Hey.
There is a cop upstairs who wants to talk to you.
translation.ja: 警官が聴取したいって

translation.en: I can cover down here if you want.
Yeah. Yeah, okay.
How's your arm? Oh, it's good as new.
Do you want some fries?
Sure. Thanks. LISA: Here. See you.
translation.ja: もらうよ じゃあね

translation.en: You didn't have to come here. They already have my statement.
Yeah, I know. I was in the area.
translation.ja: 近くにいたから寄った

translation.en: Are you okay? He didn't hurt you?
translation.ja: 大丈夫か？ ケガはない？

translation.en: Just my ego. Did you I.D. him yet?
translation.ja: 平気よ　彼の身元は？

translation.en: No, he's not talking.
We'll know more once we get him to the station.
You seem anxious. Are you staying through the night?
translation.ja: 不安そうだ 今夜はこのまま勤務？

translation.en: That's the plan.
I just know how you get when you're stressed.
translation.ja: ストレス感じてるだろ

translation.en: Okay, look, I appreciate you coming here, but I've got things covered.
translation.ja: 気遣いはうれしいけど 私は平気

translation.en: Is there something else?
I know this isn't the right time...
but when I picked up my stuff, there was something missing.
translation.ja: 引き取った荷物に 足りない物が

translation.en: A bottle of Xanax.
And you're assuming that I... what, stole them from you?
translation.ja: 私が盗んだと思ってるの？

translation.en: Did you? [SCOFFS]
It's a valid question. You're not supposed to be around
translation.ja: 規制薬物を 入手できないから…

translation.en: controlled medications of any kind.
translation.ja: 規制薬物を 入手できないから… なくしたのを私のせいに？

translation.en: You misplace a bottle of pills and automatically assume this.
translation.ja: なくしたのを私のせいに？

translation.en: Why are you getting so defensive?
I'm not getting defensive. I'm getting pissed.
You know, it's as if you're completely incapable of giving me the benefit of the doubt.
translation.ja: 頭から私を疑ってかかってる

translation.en: If you ever need my help, I'm just a call away. Okay?
translation.ja: できることがあれば 電話してくれ

translation.en: Actually, there is something you can help me with. I'll be right back.
translation.ja: 頼みたいことがある 待ってて

translation.en: Hey.
How's it going? I'm good. How are you?
I'll just be another minute if that's okay.
Yeah, no problem. Take your time.
Bases loaded, three-and-two count, down by three.
translation.ja: ３点を追う 満塁 ２ストライク

translation.en: The stakes could not be higher.
translation.ja: 勝負のかかった一球だ

translation.en: Here comes the pitch. It's a heater.
translation.ja: ピッチャーが投げる 速球だ

translation.en: It's a grand slam!
Can you run these for me at the station? The scanner broke down before I could run her prints.
translation.ja: 指紋照合をお願い スキャナーが故障してるの

translation.en: Her? Hannah Grace.
translation.ja: 誰の？ ハンナ･グレイス

translation.en: ANDREW: You already have her I.D.
I think that I.D. is fake. The picture on her license doesn't match.
translation.ja: 免許証は偽物かも 写真と遺体では―

translation.en: Her eye color, it's different.
What? Once a cop...
translation.ja: 何よ 心は警官だな

translation.en: Just get me the prints, okay?
You got it.
Dave?
I mean, seriously.
Dave?
Dave?
Hello?
Dave, is that you?
translation.ja: デイブ　あなたなの？

translation.en: Are you sure you gave me the right prints?
Positive. The results are odd.
translation.ja: 違うわ 妙な結果が出た

translation.en: Why do you say that?
Because according to the prints, Hannah Grace has been dead for three months.
translation.ja: ハンナは３か月前に死んでる

translation.en: It must be a glitch in the system. It wouldn't be the first time.
translation.ja: コンピュータの誤作動かも

translation.en: Is everything else okay?
Megan.
Yeah, thanks.
Wait, what?
Hey, Dave, where the hell are you, man?
translation.ja: デイブ　一体どこにいる？

translation.en: Is everything all right?
The security cameras downstairs... Yeah?
translation.ja: 監視映像だけど… 何だ？

translation.en: Can I access the morgue footage?
I can't leave the desk unmanned, but... here you go.
translation.ja: 俺はここを離れられないから ご自由に

translation.en: Thanks.
Come on, Megan. Just breathe.
translation.ja: しっかり メーガン 深呼吸よ

translation.en: Hey, can I talk to you for a sec?
translation.ja: リサ　ちょっといい？

translation.en: Yeah. Excuse me.
So, I thought I saw someone in the bathroom.
translation.ja: トイレで誰かを見たの

translation.en: When I went to check the security footage, I mean, I could have sworn it was her.
translation.ja: 監視カメラの映像にも 彼女の姿が…

translation.en: Meg, who is "her"? What are you talking about?
translation.ja: 待って　彼女って誰？

translation.en: I need to show you something.
There.
What is that?
I don't know.
Well, I mean, it looks like a shadow.
translation.ja: 影みたいに見えるけど

translation.en: It's not a shadow.
Look, when that guy broke in... he kept talking about the woman he killed...
translation.ja: 侵入した男が 殺された女性のことを言ってた

translation.en: Hannah Grace, how she wasn't really dead.
I looked her up. She died three months ago during an exorcism.
translation.ja: でも悪魔祓いで ３か月前に死んでる

translation.en: You know I don't believe in that kind of stuff, but...
translation.ja: 超常現象は信じないけど…

translation.en: ...this, to me, is not a shadow.
translation.ja: これは ただの 影なんかじゃない

translation.en: What is this?
Lisa, I didn't take any.
translation.ja: リサ　一錠ものんでない

translation.en: Are you lying to me? No, okay?
translation.ja: ウソつくの？ 本当なのよ　信じて

translation.en: You need to believe me on this one.
translation.ja: 本当なのよ　信じて

translation.en: I promise you, I didn't take any. I wanted to, but I didn't.
translation.ja: のみたかったけど我慢した

translation.en: I've just had them in my bag for comfort. I promise.
translation.ja: 気休めに持ってただけなの

translation.en: Meg, do you...?
Do you remember when we were in meetings and they started talking about coping mechanisms?
translation.ja: 集会で対処メカニズムの話を 聞いたわよね？

translation.en: Yeah.
An addict's brain tries to find new ways to cope with stress.
translation.ja: 脳はストレスに 対処しようとする

translation.en: Everything that has happened to you today, the stress that it has caused,
translation.ja: 今日の出来事は ストレスそのものよ

translation.en: your brain is desperate to find a way to cope with it.
translation.ja: 今 あなたの脳は 必死だから―

translation.en: And it is going to do anything it can to convince you to use again.
translation.ja: 薬をのむためなら 何でもするわ

translation.en: My brain did not put a corpse on the security footage.
translation.ja: 脳と監視映像は関係ない

translation.en: Look, I don't know what that thing is, but what I do know is you're jumping to the least plausible explanation.
translation.ja: とにかく非現実的な結論に 飛びつくのはやめて

translation.en: And right now you've got to focus.
So, don't see things that aren't there.
Here. No.
Just take them. No.
I trust you.
Okay.
Dave?
Are you okay?
Dave?
Dave?
COMPUTER: Intake bay.
RANDY: I brought you a present.
Can you give me a hand again? Sorry. I can't help you out.
translation.ja: 手助けを 悪いけど もうダメなの

translation.en: Not after last time. What? Why? What happened?
translation.ja: 悪いけど もうダメなの 何かあった？

translation.en: You wouldn't believe me if I told you.
Okay. Well, try me.
translation.ja: そうか 言ってみて

translation.en: MEGAN: So, it's obviously been a long night... and I'm probably just remembering things wrong.
translation.ja: 私の記憶違いかも しれないけど―

translation.en: She had a huge wound... going down this side of her abdomen
translation.ja: 搬入時には 腹部に大きな傷があったはず

translation.en: when you dropped her off. Correct?
translation.ja: 搬入時には 腹部に大きな傷があったはず そうよね？

translation.en: Yeah, I could have sworn that she did.
translation.ja: ああ 確かにあった

translation.en: So, where is it now?
And her arm was banged up too, right?
Yeah. Have you checked the admittance photos?
The camera broke down and when I tried to scan her prints, the scanner died too.
translation.ja: カメラも指紋用スキャナーも 故障した

translation.en: That's weird.
So, I had a friend run her prints at the police station.
translation.ja: 警察の友人に 指紋照合を頼んだ

translation.en: And?
Hannah Grace, she died three months ago during an exorcism.
translation.ja: 彼女はハンナ･グレイス ３か月前 悪魔祓いで死亡

translation.en: Whoa. When that man broke in, he said she wasn't really dead,
translation.ja: 侵入者は “まだ死んでない”と

translation.en: and now it's almost like she's healing herself.
translation.ja: 実際 彼女は治ってきてる

translation.en: Can I ask you a personal question?
translation.ja: 個人的な質問をしても？

translation.en: How personal?
Why are you working the night shift at a morgue?
translation.ja: なぜ霊安室で 夜勤なんてしてる？

translation.en: Because it's my job.
No, no. You're smart and resourceful.
translation.ja: 君は頭もいいし 有能なのに―

translation.en: So, what happened?
You know what? Actually, it's not even-- I'm sorry. It's not my business.
translation.ja: 余計なお世話だな すまない
数年前の俺は荒れてた

translation.en: [SIGHS] I had a rough patch a few years back and...
translation.ja: 数年前の俺は荒れてた 君にもつらい時期が あったのかと

translation.en: I don't know, I guess I thought I saw that in you.
translation.ja: 君にもつらい時期が あったのかと

translation.en: I'm sure that there is a rational explanation for all of this.
translation.ja: 遺体のことは 何らかの説明がつく

translation.en: You just-- Megan, you've got to be careful
translation.ja: だから… あまり神経質になるな

translation.en: that you don't drive yourself crazy here.
translation.ja: あまり神経質になるな

translation.en: I know.
He's adorable.
I used to have a drinking problem.
And I would get drunk... and lie and cheat and...
translation.ja: 酔ってはウソをつき 人をだましてた

translation.en: people told me that I was a dick sometimes. All the time.
translation.ja: 嫌な野郎で 周りに迷惑をかけたよ

translation.en: And then... this guy shows up...
and he made me want to be a better person.
So...
I quit drinking... I quit lying...
translation.ja: 酒もウソをつくのも やめたんだ

translation.en: and then I was finally able to be honest with the people that love me...
translation.ja: 愛してくれる人たちに 向き合えた

translation.en: because I was finally able to be honest with myself.
translation.ja: 自分に向き合えたからだ

translation.en: If you ever want to talk, I'm the guy.
Thank you.
Have a good night. You, too. Get home safe.
translation.ja: いい夜を あなたも　気をつけて

translation.en: COMPUTER: Intake bay.
Hey, I was just about to call you.
translation.ja: 電話しようと思ってた

translation.en: That bottle of Xanax that you were looking for...
I didn't take it.
Megan, you already told me this.
I found it in the medicine cabinet
after you moved out.
And I should have packed it up with the rest of your things...
translation.ja: でも あなたの荷物に―

translation.en: but I kept it.
I've just been feeling anxious lately...
translation.ja: 最近 ずっと不安だったの

translation.en: and I felt safer knowing that they were there.
translation.ja: でも薬があると思うと 落ち着いた

translation.en: You know, in case I needed them.
Why are you telling me this?
Because I'm tired of lying.
Anyway, I'll drop them off tomorrow morning if you're there.
translation.ja: 明日の朝 署に持っていく

translation.en: Yeah, I'll be there. I'm glad you told me, okay?
translation.ja: 話してくれて うれしいよ

translation.en: Me, too. Bye. Bye.
translation.ja: 話せてよかった　じゃ じゃあ

translation.en: COMPUTER: Going down.
This is Randy, drop-off complete.
translation.ja: こちらランディ　搬入は完了

translation.en: Goddamn it.
Hello?
Hello?
Randy.
Randy?
Oh, my God.
Randy.
Andrew.
Megan, go to security right now.
The guy who broke into the morgue killed the two officers transporting him to the station. We have an APB out on him, but there's a chance he could make--
translation.ja: さっきの侵入者が 連行中に警官を殺して逃げた

translation.en: Move. ANDREW: Megan?
Megan?
Open it.
Get the lift.
Do you see what's happening to her body?
She's healing.
She heals herself by killing people and then she rests.
translation.ja: 人を殺すことで 治っていくんだ

translation.en: Why hasn't she killed you?
I don't know.
I believe you.
There's something evil hiding inside.
translation.ja: 邪悪なものが中に潜んでる

translation.en: The church... said to walk away...
translation.ja: 関わるなと 教会には言われたが―

translation.en: but I couldn't give up on my only child.
translation.ja: 一人娘を見捨てられず…

translation.en: That's your daughter?
Not anymore.
Hannah struggled with depression... anxiety.
translation.ja: ハンナは鬱(うつ)状態に 苦しんでいた

translation.en: It worked on her... day after day...
translation.ja: 奴はそこにつけ込み 毎日のように―

translation.en: till it broke her...
...found its way inside her body.
Is that when her eye changed?
Yeah.
That's the demon's mark.
No matter how many exorcisms they performed, it stayed.
translation.ja: 何度 悪魔祓いをしても 悪霊は去らず

translation.en: One last...
...attempt.
In the name of God, in the name of Jesus Christ... our Lord, be gone!
translation.ja: 神とイエスの御名によって去れ

translation.en: You have to understand...
...I did what I did...
...to save the lives of others.
But the demon was too powerful.
translation.ja: だが この悪霊は強すぎて―

translation.en: It stayed.
The next day, when we went to bury her...
translation.ja: 翌日 埋葬しに行くと―

translation.en: ...her body, it disappeared from the mortuary.
translation.ja: 葬儀場から遺体が消えてた

translation.en: Four people were dead.
We have to get her to the incinerator.
The knife wasn't enough. The only way to destroy this thing is to burn her.
translation.ja: 刃物ではダメだ こいつを滅ぼすには―

translation.en: Anything else just slows her down.
Come and get me!
No! Stop! [SCREAMING]
No!
Stop!
Come on. Come on.
Come on.
Come on.
Come on!
COMPUTER: Mezzanine.
No.
COMPUTER: Going up.
COMPUTER: Arrived at mezzanine.
Officer Kurtz, reporting a 10-65. I need backup at Boston Metro Hospital,
translation.ja: カーツ巡査だ ボストン･メトロ病院へ応援を

translation.en: possible homicide.
COMPUTER: Arrived at morgue.
Megan?
Megan?
Megan?
Oh, my God.
Oh, my God.
Oh, God.
Fuck.
Who's there? It's Officer Kurtz.
translation.ja: 誰だ カーツ巡査だ

translation.en: Megan's friend. Where is she? Yeah, I don't know.
translation.ja: メーガンを捜してる どこだか　デイブも消えた

translation.en: Dave's missing, too.
translation.ja: どこだか　デイブも消えた

translation.en: Everything's down. What's going on down here?
translation.ja: 停電してる どうなってんだ

translation.en: Oh, God.
ANDREW: Megan. Andrew. Oh, my God.
translation.ja: メーガン アンドリュー

translation.en: What happened? We have to get out of here.
translation.ja: どうした 早く逃げなきゃ

translation.en: [SCREECHING NOISE] ANDREW: What the hell is that?
Come on.
What? Oh, my God. Come on! Come on!
translation.ja: 何だ マズい　急いで！

translation.en: Hey!
COMPUTER: Going down.
ERNIE: Megan!
Hey, stop!
MEGAN: No!
Let him go!
Megan.
Megan.
Andrew. Are you okay?
MEGAN: Okay, come on. Hurry. We don't have much time.
translation.ja: 立って　早く 急がないと

translation.en: Go get help. Wait. What? Megan.
translation.ja: 行って 待て　何する気だ メーガン

translation.en: No! Help me, please!
MEGAN: I'm 62 days clean...
...and I'm thankful for how far I've come.
It's not easy.
And I know I have a long way to go...
but I'm feeling stronger every day.
translation.ja: 日ごとに私は強くなる

translation.en: Nothing's going to stop me now.
translation.ja: 何も私を止められない
